Mariko woke up in her bed from a long, restful sleep. She sat up and stretched out, yawning. She looked down at her body and remembered that the only articles of clothing she was wearing was a training bra and a large, thick white diaper... which she had soiled, badly.

Mariko's mom slowly entered the room.
"Mari? Are you up yet? Do you want to be changed?" Mom asked.
Mariko sighed. She knew Mom would change her no matter what she said. The young girl just stood up and followed her mother to the bathroom.

Mariko laid down on the changing mat while Mom got the supplies ready. Mom gently untaped Mari's diaper.
"Wew... Stinky, stinky." Mom said, shaking her head.
"Mom, do you have to say it like that?" Mariko said, embarrassed.
"I'm sorry, honey. I'll say it different next time." Mom said.

Mom went to work wiping her teenage daughter's diaper area. Once Mariko was nice and clean, Mom applied some baby oil and some powder before finally taping up the diaper.
"There you go!" Mom said.
Mariko stood up. No matter how many times her mom diapered her, it still felt a little humiliating....But she wanted to be nice to her mom.
"Thanks, Mom. That was really nice of you to change me like that." Mariko said, although she only said it half-heartedly; she would rather change herself.
Mom smiled.
"Not a problem! Any time!" Mom said.

Mariko went back to her room to get dressed. She slipped on a long skirt to conceal her diaper, and put on a fresh training bra and a T-Shirt.

Mariko grabbed her book bag, which also had a day's supply of diapers in it, started walking to her middle school, which was thankfully only two blocks away. She had just left her house when one of her friends, another Japanese girl named Kaori, noticed her. Kaori normally looked a lot like Mariko, a bit on the short side and skinny. They were both petite, as Kaori's mother liked to say. It was said that they could be mistaken for sister... except for the fact that Kaori had dyed her hair pink now.
"Mari! Hey Mari!" Kaori said, running over to her friend.
"Hi Kaori. Hey, when did you dye your hair pink? It looks really nice!" Mariko said.
"Yesterday. My mom helped me with it. I thought she would flip out when I told her I wanted pink hair but she actually thought it was a cool idea." Kaori said.
"Ha, lucky. My mom would've yelled at me and said it makes me look like a cartoon character or a punk or something." Mariko said.
"So, did you study for the algebra test today?" Kaori asked.
"A little. I'm pretty strong in algebra, so I've been looking more at my science notes." Mariko said.
The two of them soon entered the school and went to their lockers, which were near each other. Mariko got out some papers she had stored there as well as some pencils and pens. Now she was ready for her first class of the day, which was...

112.content:
Mariko ate a quick breakfast and read a little bit of one of her books while she ate. Then she started getting her things together to go out for the day.
"You going out? Don't forget this!" Mom said.
She handed Mariko her diaper bag, a large thick brown bag with her diapers and changing supplies in it. Mariko was always a tiny bit embarrassed to be carrying it around while her friends had stylish purses and bags.
"Um... Thanks, Mom." Mari said.
"Call me in a couple hours to let me know how you're doing, okay?" Mom said.
"Yeah, yeah, I will." Mariko said.
Mom ran over to Mariko and gave her a hug before she left.
"I love you, sweety!" Mom said.
Mariko struggled against her mother.
"Mom, I love you too, but you're embarrassing me." Mariko said.
"Aw, no one's too embarrassed to love their mommy!" Mom said, lightly laughing.

Mariko went down the street to the nearest bus stop and took the bus to the café she and her friends hung out at. They didn't order anything a lot of the time, but the manager didn't seem to mind them staying around. Kaori and Chiharu, Mariko's two friends, were already at a booth.

Chiharu was a little taller than Mariko it and was very apparent that she was going trough puberty. She was starting to grow breasts and had awkwardly large feet which made her quite clumsy. She had a warm and friendly personality, though, and was constantly optimistic. Kaori looked a lot like Mariko, in fact it was often said that they could be sisters. However, she was a bit more outgoing than Mariko and much more reckless and daring. She had dyed her hair pink.

"Mari! Good to see you!" Chiharu said.
"Hi Mari!" Kaori said.
Mariko sat down with her friends.
"Hi, guys. Ooh, Kaori, I love your hair! When did you dye it?" Mariko said.
"Yesterday morning. My mom helped me with it, she thought it was a fun idea when I told her I wanted pink hair, can you believe it?" Kaori said.
"Cool." Mariko said.
"So, how are things going with you?" Chiharu asked.
"Not much going on. Same old boring days right now." Mariko said.
"Yeah, me too. Nothing going on with me either." Chiharu said.
They were silent for an awkward moment.
...

"Man, you two are boring this morning let's spice things up!" Kaori suggested.
"Yeah, let's have some fun!" Mariko said.
The three of them put their heads together to think of what to do now...

She opened her purse and showed that it was had her wallet, as well as a copious amount of tampons still in the wrapper, almost as if she were showing off a tampon collection.

"How about the arcade? Always some funny stuff going on there." Kaori suggested.

Many of the games featured crude humor and some even rewarded the player with pictures of naked men and women if they won enough times. The place always had a permanent odor of tobacco since the owner was a heavy smoker and allowed smoking inside, even though it was technically against the law to let people smoke indoors. Some of the machines were even made more for gambling and would reward you with more tokens instead of simply giving you a score. These things, almost paradoxically, made it even more of an attractive place to kids and teenagers since their parents wouldn't let them go there normally.

The three girls went in and were greeted by the owner, a friendly fat balding man who everyone called "Bear-Dog". No one knew his real name, he was just called "Bear-Dog" by everyone.
"Hey, girlies! Welcome in! You're some of the first ones here." He said.
"Aw, cool! no lines this time of day!" Kaori said.
The three of them exchanged a little bit of money for some token and went for a game.
"Ohh, let's try this one! I never played this!" Kaori said.
She ran over to a game called "Saucy Bowling". It was a bowling game that would show you pictures of naked men if you scored repeated strikes.
"Hey, you kids! That game's for adults!" Bear-Dog said.
"We're 13. That's adult enough, right?" Mariko said.
Bear-Dog shrugged his shoulders.
"Eh, suit yourself. I ain't gonna stop you, but I warned you, Saucy Bowling gets mighty saucy. Try not to pass out form the sauciness." He said.

The three girls put in their tokens and started up a game of Saucy Bowling
